name: beneficiation

the process of treating ore (= rock from which metal can be obtained) or similar material from the earth in order to improve it : Tests showed that the extractions contained over 85 percent nickel with no beneficiation. The company was awarded a contract to construct an iron ore beneficiation plant on the edge of town.
